question: Grand Central Terminal, Park Avenue, New York is the world's
answer_description: Grand Central Terminal in New York City, USA: Grand Central Terminal is one of the most iconic and busiest railway stations in the world, serving over 750,000 passengers per day. It is located in midtown Manhattan and has 44 platforms, making it one of the largest railway stations by platform count.
